Uhh, what now?
Honestly I have no idea if you're serious or you're screwing with me. Then again, what do I know? Honestly, [spoiler]if Eren can come back from the dead and become a muthafriggin Titan that can kill the ever living crap out of other Titans, then anything is likely.[/spoiler]

Then again, I'd might as well watch all of Evangelion, or rewatch FLCL, if I want my brain screwed with. Or I could just read YouTube comments, or SJW rambles, or whatever witty thing Jerry Peet wants to "talk about".
